main_definition: Primarily or chiefly; mostly, with emphasis on the most important aspect of something.

meanings_and_examples.example: The restaurant mainly serves Italian cuisine.
She spends most of her time working, so she is unable to devote much time to hobbies. She does other activities mainly in her free time.

meanings_and_examples.definition: To the largest extent or degree
meanings_and_examples.example: The project was successful mainly due to effective teamwork and strong leadership.
Mainly, my job involves communicating with clients over the phone.
